channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-6676] hcat cli fails to run when running with hive on tez
item.description: HIVE_CLASSPATH should be added to HADOOP_CLASSPATH before launching hcat CLI
item.summary: hcat cli fails to run when running with hive on tez

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
